MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the G83 postcode area of Alexandria, affecting properties in Golfhill Drive and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of this at 7:13AM. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of further fault investigations being required our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by midday. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:23am 14 February 2021.
